name: Mementotlan Mystical Sheep
text: If a monster(s) in your possession was destroyed by card effect this turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned (except during the Damage Step): You can Fusion Summon 1 "Memento" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can send 1 "Memento" card from your Deck to the GY, except "Mementotlan Mystical Sheep". You can only use each effect of "Mementotlan Mystical Sheep" once per turn.
